resource view (using 2.0 build 03/07/2002) I get an IllegalArgumentException

clicked "no" but it exited anyway.  When I restart Eclipse, it attempts to open 
the same file and I get the same error...  so it would seem I'm suck.  Attached 
is the xsd file.
